   <script>
    (function(){
 			var lastPopup;
 			
 			function removeScrollableEnviroment() {
                 $("body").removeClass('noscroll');
             }
 			
 			//get popup content
 			var getComponent = function(id, $popup, parameter, callback){
 				var $unmoved = $()
 				if($popup.length > 1) $unmoved = $($.grep($popup, function(that){
 					return !$(that).is('.moved');
 				}));
 				if($unmoved.length > 0) $popup = $unmoved;
 	
 				if(window.backend) {
 					$.ajax({
 						url: '/widget/renderWidget',
 						type: 'POST',
 						dataType: 'json',
 						traditional: true,
 						data: $.extend(getURLParameterObject(), parameter, {
 							widgetParentIdList: $popup.getParentWidgetIdList().join('.'),
 							widgetConfigId: id,
 							popup_open: id,
 		                    renderMode: window.backend.renderMode,
 		                    renderTime: getRenderTime()
 						}),
 						success: function(data){
 							if(typeof callback == 'function') callback(data);
 						}
 					});
 					
 				} else {
 					$.ajax({
 						url: window.location.href,
 						type: 'post',
 						traditional: true,
 						data: $.extend(parameter, {
 							widgetParentIdList: $popup.getParentWidgetIdList().join('.'),
 							popup_open: id
 						}),
 						success: function(data){
 							if(typeof callback == 'function') callback(data);
 						}
 					});
 				}
 			};
 			
 			//initialize popup
 			var lastHash = '';
 			var callPopup = function(hash){
 				if(hash != '' && hash != '#') {
 					var splitted = hash.split('?');
 					var parameter = {};
 					
 					function addParameter(key,value){
 						if (parameter[key]){
 							if (!Array.isArray(parameter[key])){
 								parameter[key] = [parameter[key]];
 							}
 							parameter[key].push(value);
 						}else{
 							parameter[key] = value;
 						}
 					}
 					
 					function moveToVisible($popup){
 						var $return = $popup;
 						if(!$popup.is(':visible')) {
 							$popup.show();
 							if(!$popup.is(':visible')) {
 								$popup.hide();
 								$return = $popup.clone(true, true).addClass('moved');
 								$popup.closest(':visible').append($return);
 							} else $popup.hide();
 						}
 						return $return;
 					}
 					
 					function moveOutOfHover($popup){
 						var $return = $popup;
 						var $hover = $popup.closest('.widget-Hover');
 						if($hover.length > 0) {
 							$return = $popup.clone(true, true).addClass('moved');
 							$hover.before($return);
 						}
 						return $return;
 					}
 					
 					function movePopup($popup){
 						return moveOutOfHover(moveToVisible($popup));
 					}
 					
 					function createScrollableEnviroment() {
 						$("body").addClass('noscroll');
 					}
 					
 					if(splitted.length > 1) {
 						var data = splitted[1].split('&');
 						data.forEach(function(item, index){
 							var item = item.split('=');
 							
 							if(item.length > 1){
 								addParameter(item[0],item[1]);
 					    	}else addParameter(item[0],null);
 						})
 					}
 					splitted = splitted[0].split('|');
 					var id = splitted[0].substring(1);
 					var $popup = $();
 					try {
 						$popup = $('.widget-Popup---' + id + ':not(.moved)').addClass('originalPopup').first();
 					} catch(err) {}
 					if($popup.length > 0) {
 						lastHash = hash;
 						$('body').loaderShow();
 						getComponent(id, $popup, jQuery.extend({}, parameter), function(data){
 							$('body').loaderHide();
 							$('html').addClass('popupOpen');
 		            		$('.widget-Popup---' + lastPopup).hide().trigger('removeReloadAction', lastPopup);
 							lastPopup = id;
 		                    if (data.markup) {
 		                    	$popup.trigger('addReloadAction', [id, function(){
 		                    		$(this).show();
 		                    		movePopup($(this));
 		                    		createScrollableEnviroment();
 		            			}]);
 		                    	
 		                    	var $markup = data.markup
 		                    	try {
 		                        	$markup = $(data.markup)
 		                        	if(!$markup.is('.widget-Popup---' + id)) $markup = $markup.find('.widget-Popup---' + id);
 		                    	} catch(e){}
 		                    	$popup.each(function(){
 		                    		if($(this).is('.moved')) $(this).remove()
 		                    	});
 		                    	$popup.replaceWith($markup);
 		                        var $newPopup = $('.widget-Popup---' + id + ':not(.originalPopup)').first();
 		                        if($newPopup.length == 0) $newPopup = $('.widget-Popup---' + id).first();
 		                        $newPopup = movePopup($newPopup);
 		                        $popup.data('additional-reload-parameter', parameter).addClass('additional-reload-parameter')
 		                        createScrollableEnviroment();
 		                        $newPopup.find('.widget-Popup--container-inner---' + id).showAnimated((splitted.length > 0 ? splitted[1]:undefined));
 		                        $newPopup.show();
 		                        placeHead(data.headRegion);
 		                        placeScripts(data.scripts);
 		                        var callbacks = $.fn.reloadWidget.getSuccessCallback();
 	                    	    for(var i = 0; i < callbacks.length; i++) {
 	                    	    	if(typeof callbacks[i] == 'function') callbacks[i].apply($newPopup, [data]);
 	                    	    }
 		                    }
 						});
 					}
 				} 
 			};
 			
 			//close popup
 			$(document).off('close.popupHash', '.widget-Popup');
 			$(document).on('close.popupHash', '.widget-Popup', function(){
 				window.history.pushState(null, null, window.location.href.split('#')[0]);
 				removeScrollableEnviroment();
 			});
 			
 			//show popup on page load
 			$(document).ready(function(){
 				callPopup(window.location.hash);
 			});
 	
 			//show popup on hash change
 			$(window).off('hashchange.btPopup');
 			$(window).on('hashchange.btPopup', function() {
 				var $popup = $('.widget-Popup---' + lastPopup);
 				if($popup.triggerHandler('modalDependentClose') !== false) {
 					$popup.trigger('removeReloadAction', lastPopup);
 					var hashSplit = window.location.hash.split('?');
 					var lastHashSplit = lastHash.split('?');
 					if(lastHashSplit[0] == hashSplit[0] && hashSplit.length != lastHashSplit.length && hashSplit.length == 1) {
 						var tmp = lastHash;
 						lastHash = window.location.hash;
 						window.location.hash = tmp;
 					} else {
 						callPopup(window.location.hash);
 					}
 				} else {
 					window.location.hash = lastHash;
 				}
 			});
 			
 			$(document).off('click.popupCheck', 'a');
 			$(document).on('click.popupCheck', 'a', function(){
 				if(window.location.hash == $(this).attr('href')) {
 					$('.widget-Popup---' + lastPopup).hide();
 					$('html').removeClass('popupOpen');
 					callPopup(window.location.hash);
 				}
 			});
 		})();
   </script>
   <script>
    try {
 			(function(w,d,s,l,i){w[l]=w[l]||[];w[l].push({'gtm.start':
 new Date().getTime(),event:'gtm.js'});var f=d.getElementsByTagName(s)[0],
 j=d.createElement(s),dl=l!='dataLayer'?'&l='+l:'';j.async=true;j.src=
 'https://www.googletagmanager.com/gtm.js?id='+i+dl;f.parentNode.insertBefore(j,f);
 })(window,document,'script','dataLayer','GTM-KM6K3JR');
 		} catch (ex) {
 			console.error('Error in HTML Widget script: ' + ex.message);
 			if(false) {
 				alertify.warning('Error in HTML Widget script: ' + ex.message);				
 			}
 		}
   </script>
   <script>
    function getScrollOffset(){
 			var maxHeight = 0;
 			$('.widget-StickyTop').each(function(){
 				var height = $(this).height();
 				if(height > maxHeight) maxHeight = height;
 			});
 			return maxHeight;
 		}
   </script>
  </head>

    </div>

           <div class="widget-Root--subContent widget-Root--subContent---5b0ff5b8-4516-4b7d-845b-39c23e478e4d widget-Root--subContent---view-root" widget-child="content">

              <div class="widget widget-StickyTop widget-StickyTop---76778f53-9281-4f7d-8283-a1cfd7d3e9f0 widget-StickyTop---view-sticky-top widget-StickyTop---preset-default " data-subwidget-id="ea6da78b-105d-41f0-af4f-67b3e771ccc1" data-widget-id="76778f53-9281-4f7d-8283-a1cfd7d3e9f0">
               <div class="widget-StickyTop--sub-content widget-StickyTop--sub-content---76778f53-9281-4f7d-8283-a1cfd7d3e9f0 widget-StickyTop--sub-content---view-sticky-top widget-StickyTop--sub-content---preset-default original referenced" widget-child="content">

                       </a>
                       <span class="widget-NavigationElement--arrow widget-NavigationElement--arrow---401dd328-ec63-4441-978a-2fbbd848b13c widget-NavigationElement--arrow---view-navigation-element widget-NavigationElement--arrow---preset-default has-sub" onclick="void(0)">

             <div class="widget-Container--subContent widget-Container--subContent---size-full widget-Container--subContent---f5cc4728-6080-405f-9eab-75a60cdce023 widget-Container--subContent---view-container widget-Container--subContent---preset-default" widget-child="content">
              <div class="widget widget-Root widget-Root---ffabbc61-39b0-405e-b07a-cdb4badce800 widget-Root---view-root hidden-xs hidden-sm hidden-md " data-subwidget-id="f86a6ee9-1043-410f-9bf2-a76a2afbb618" data-widget-id="ffabbc61-39b0-405e-b07a-cdb4badce800" style="width: 100%; margin: 0 auto;">
               <div class="widget-Root--subContent widget-Root--subContent---ffabbc61-39b0-405e-b07a-cdb4badce800 widget-Root--subContent---view-root" widget-child="content">

                            <li class="widget widget-NavigationElement widget-NavigationElement---fa03e458-8a8d-4337-a2ca-1e71fdc60f94 widget-NavigationElement---view-navigation-element widget-NavigationElement---preset-default notOpen hasSubMenu " data-subwidget-id="386d46e5-3d3d-419e-a6a1-0ed04c4ea3ea" data-widget-id="fa03e458-8a8d-4337-a2ca-1e71fdc60f94">
                             <a class="widget-NavigationElement--link widget-NavigationElement--link---fa03e458-8a8d-4337-a2ca-1e71fdc60f94 widget-NavigationElement--link---view-navigation-element widget-NavigationElement--link---preset-default" href="/shop/unsere-produkte/telekom-navigation" target="_self">
                              Telekom &amp; Navigation
                             </a>
                             <span class="widget-NavigationElement--arrow widget-NavigationElement--arrow---fa03e458-8a8d-4337-a2ca-1e71fdc60f94 widget-NavigationElement--arrow---view-navigation-element widget-NavigationElement--arrow---preset-default has-sub" onclick="void(0)">
                             </span>

                        <span class="widget-MyAccountIcon--spanContainer widget-MyAccountIcon--spanContainer---a344cd1a-9666-4f95-a88e-99df31b9fc6b widget-MyAccountIcon--spanContainer---view-my-account-icon widget-MyAccountIcon--spanContainer---preset-default">
                         <a class="widget-MyAccountIcon--loginLink widget-MyAccountIcon--loginLink---a344cd1a-9666-4f95-a88e-99df31b9fc6b widget-MyAccountIcon--loginLink---view-my-account-icon widget-MyAccountIcon--loginLink---preset-default" href="https://www.expert.de/Anmelden" target="_self">
                          Jetzt einloggen
                         </a>
                        </span>
                        <div class="widget-MyAccountIcon--dropZone widget-MyAccountIcon--dropZone---a344cd1a-9666-4f95-a88e-99df31b9fc6b widget-MyAccountIcon--dropZone---view-my-account-icon widget-MyAccountIcon--dropZone---preset-default" widget-child="dropZone">
                        </div>
                        <a class="widget-MyAccountIcon--regContainer widget-MyAccountIcon--regContainer---a344cd1a-9666-4f95-a88e-99df31b9fc6b widget-MyAccountIcon--regContainer---view-my-account-icon widget-MyAccountIcon--regContainer---preset-default" href="https://www.expert.de/registrieren" target="_self">
                         <div class="widget-MyAccountIcon--imgLogo widget-MyAccountIcon--imgLogo---a344cd1a-9666-4f95-a88e-99df31b9fc6b widget-MyAccountIcon--imgLogo---view-my-account-icon widget-MyAccountIcon--imgLogo---preset-default">
                         </div>
                         <span class="widget-MyAccountIcon--registerText widget-MyAccountIcon--registerText---a344cd1a-9666-4f95-a88e-99df31b9fc6b widget-MyAccountIcon--registerText---view-my-account-icon widget-MyAccountIcon--registerText---preset-default" data-inlineediting="text">
                          Neu bei expert?
                          <strong>
                           Jetzt registrieren
                          </strong>

                       </div>
                      </li>

                                         Ähnliche Merkmale:
                                        </strong>
                                       </span>
                                      </p>

                                       Bis zu 16+1 verschiedene Längeneinstellungen (3–35mm)
                                      </li>
                                      <li class="widget-ArticlePriceTagText--detailPoint widget-ArticlePriceTagText--detailPoint---f162c70d-cc0f-4ae4-a5aa-6bb41835c1b6 widget-ArticlePriceTagText--detailPoint---view-article-price-tag-text widget-ArticlePriceTagText--detailPoint---preset-default">
                                       2 Trimmeraufsätze (für kurze und lange Haare)

                                      <li class="widget-ArticlePriceTagText--detailPoint widget-ArticlePriceTagText--detailPoint---f162c70d-cc0f-4ae4-a5aa-6bb41835c1b6 widget-ArticlePriceTagText--detailPoint---view-article-price-tag-text widget-ArticlePriceTagText--detailPoint---preset-default">
                                       Energieeffizienzklasse: A+++
                                      </li>

                <div class="widget widget-Column widget-Column---049913b5-8d23-4151-b449-4466d5aefb60 widget-Column---view-column widget-Column---preset-default drag-not-allowed grid-col-xs-12 grid-col-md-4 " data-subwidget-id="a6502bb5-f730-41f4-b9c9-90635224e3e1" data-widget-id="049913b5-8d23-4151-b449-4466d5aefb60">
                 <div class="widget-Column--content widget-Column--content---049913b5-8d23-4151-b449-4466d5aefb60 widget-Column--content---view-column widget-Column--content---preset-default" widget-child="content">
                  <div class="widget widget-Text widget-Text---1abf4375-987a-43db-b641-ca31e5d77068 widget-Text---view-text widget-Text---preset-default margin-md-top-50 " data-subwidget-id="b72294e8-9ccf-4892-bc87-1479cf187f29" data-widget-id="1abf4375-987a-43db-b641-ca31e5d77068">
                   <div class="widget-Text--text widget-Text--text---1abf4375-987a-43db-b641-ca31e5d77068 widget-Text--text---view-text widget-Text--text---preset-default" data-inlineediting="text.text">
                    <p>
                     <span style="color: #f8f8f8; font-size: 24pt;">
                      <strong>
                       <a href="/Themenwelten" style="color: #f8f8f8;">
                        Entdecken Sie alle aktuellen Aktionen
                       </a>
                      </strong>
                     </span>
                    </p>
                   </div>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
            <div class="widget widget-Text widget-Text---40bc011c-03f7-4348-adff-4ff7f649b4f7 widget-Text---view-text widget-Text---preset-default " data-subwidget-id="1d58a68d-315d-4a4f-b79b-e2ae8cccc23d" data-widget-id="40bc011c-03f7-4348-adff-4ff7f649b4f7">

               <span style="font-size: 8pt;">
                *weitere Informationen zu der Aktion erhalten Sie auf der Detailseite
               </span>

                   <div class="widget-Container--subContent widget-Container--subContent---size-default widget-Container--subContent---69e6ec82-3b96-4483-a96b-4501dbfb30b1 widget-Container--subContent---view-container widget-Container--subContent---preset-default" widget-child="content">

         <div widget-child="content">
          <div class="widget widget-TrustedShop widget-TrustedShop---cac99167-f8ee-49ba-902e-118c5abf4ee1 widget-TrustedShop---view-trusted-shop widget-TrustedShop---preset-default " data-subwidget-id="93f232cd-3296-4601-a511-a699247a06b8" data-widget-id="cac99167-f8ee-49ba-902e-118c5abf4ee1">

   <script async="async" src="/static/resources/private/javascript/econda/emos3.js" type="text/javascript">
   </script>
   <script>
    (function(){
 			//prevent popup in popup
 			$('.widget-Popup').each(function(){
 				if($(this).parent().closest('.widget-Popup').length > 0) {
 					$('.widget-Popup:first').after($(this).clone(true, true).addClass('moved'));
 				}
 			});
 			
 			//close editor, prevent to open editor and hide popup 
 			$('.btWidgetAssign .widgetContainer').off('click.widget-Popup', '.widget-Popup--close, .widget-Popup');
 			$('.btWidgetAssign .widgetContainer').on('click.widget-Popup', '.widget-Popup--close, .widget-Popup', function(e){
 				if($(e.target).is('.widget-Popup--close')) {
 					e.stopPropagation();
 					var wId = $(this).closest('.widget-Popup').trigger('close').attr('data-widget-id');
 					$(this).closest('.btWidgetAssign').trigger('removeReloadAction', wId);
 					$('.btInlineEditor-' + wId + ' .close').trigger('click');
 				}else{
 					if ($(e.target).is('.widget-Popup, .widget-Popup--container-outer')){
 						if (!$(this).closest('.widget-Popup').data('modal') || false){
 							e.stopPropagation();
 							var wId = $(this).closest('.widget-Popup').trigger('close').attr('data-widget-id');
 							$(this).closest('.btWidgetAssign').trigger('removeReloadAction', wId);
 							$('.btInlineEditor-' + wId + ' .close').trigger('click');
 						}						
 					}
 				}
 			});
 			$(document).off('disableModal.widget-Popup');
 			$(document).on('disableModal.widget-Popup','.widget-Popup',function(e){
 				$(this).data('modal',false);
 			});
 			//hide popup backup if no editor exists
 			$(document).off('click.widget-Popup', '.widget-Popup--close, .widget-Popup');
 			$(document).on('click.widget-Popup', '.widget-Popup--close, .widget-Popup', function(e){
 				if($(e.target).is('.widget-Popup--close')) {
 					$(this).closest('.widget-Popup').trigger('close');
 				}else{
 					if (!$(this).closest('.widget-Popup').data('modal')){
 						if ($(e.target).is('.widget-Popup, .widget-Popup--container-outer')){
 							$(this).closest('.widget-Popup').trigger('close');
 						}
 					}
 					
 				}
 			});
 			//hide function
 			$(document).off('close.widget-Popup', '.widget-Popup');
 			$(document).on('close.widget-Popup', '.widget-Popup', function(e){
 				$(this).hide();
 				$('html').removeClass('popupOpen');
 			});
 			$('.widget-Popup').off('modalDependentClose.widget-Popup');
 			$('.widget-Popup').on('modalDependentClose.widget-Popup', function(e){
 				var modal = $(this).closest('.widget-Popup').data('modal') && !false
 				if(!modal) {
 					$(this).hide();
 					$('html').removeClass('popupOpen');
 				}
 				return !modal;
 			});
 			$(window).off('keyup.widget-Popup');
 			$(window).on('keyup.widget-Popup', function(e){
 				if(e.keyCode == 27 && !false) {
 					$('.widget-Popup:visible').last().trigger('modalDependentClose');
 				}
 			});
 		})();
   </script>
   <script>
    (function(){
 			$(document).off("scroll.widget-StickyTop");
 			$(document).on("scroll.widget-StickyTop", function(event) {
 				$('.widget-StickyTop').each(function(){
 					if ($(window).scrollTop() >= $(this).offset().top) {
 						$(this).children('.widget-StickyTop--cloned').addClass('sticky');
 					} else {
 						$(this).children('.widget-StickyTop--cloned').removeClass('sticky');
 					}
 				});
 			});
 			var changeEvent = function(){
 				if(window.location.hash.length > 0) {
 					var hash = window.location.hash.split('?')[0].split('|')[0];
 					var $element = $(hash);
 					if($element.length == 0) {
 						$element = $('a[name="'+ hash.substr(1) + '"]')
 					}
 					if($element.length > 0) {
 			 			$(window).scrollTop($element.offset().top - getScrollOffset());
 					}
 				}
 			};
 			$(document).ready(function(){
 				changeEvent();//firefox
 				setTimeout(changeEvent);//chrome
 				setTimeout(changeEvent, 250);//ie
 			});
 			$(window).off('hashchange.widget-StickyTop');
 			$(window).on('hashchange.widget-StickyTop', changeEvent);
 		})();
   </script>
   <script>
    $(document).ready(function() {
 		   var insertParam = function(key, value) {
 		        key = encodeURI(key);
 		        value = encodeURI(value);
 		        var kvp = document.location.search.substr(1).split('&');
 		        if(kvp == '') {
 		            window.history.pushState(null, null, '?' + key + '=' + value);
 		        } else {
 		            var i = kvp.length;
 		            var x;
 		            while(i--) {
 		                x = kvp[i].split('=');
 		                if(x[0] == key) {
 		                    x[1] = value;
 		                    kvp[i] = x.join('=');
 		                    break;
 		                }
 		            }
 		            if(i < 0) {
 		                kvp[kvp.length] = [key, value].join('=');
 		            }
 		            window.history.pushState(null, null, '?' + kvp.join('&'));
 		        }
 		    };
 		   
 		    $('.widget-Search').off('focus.overlayTrigger');
 		    $('.widget-Search').on('focus.overlayTrigger', '.widget-Search--searchfield', function(e) {
 		        $(this).parents('.widget-Search').addClass('active');
 		    });
 		    
 		    $('.widget-Search--searchfield').off('click.overlayTrigger');
             $('.widget-Search--searchfield').on('click.overlayTrigger', function(e) {
                 e.stopPropagation();
             });
             
             $('.widget-Search--results').off('click.stopProp');
             $('.widget-Search--results').on('click.stopProp', function(e) {
             	if(!$('body').hasClass('wysiwyg')) {
             		e.stopPropagation();
             	}
             });
 		    
 		    $('.widget-Search').off('click.overlayDisable');
             $('.widget-Search').on('click.overlayDisable', '.widget-Search--overlay', function() {
            		$(this).parents('.widget-Search').removeClass('active');
             });
             
             $('.widget-Search--searchFormClose').off('click.closeOverlay');
             $('.widget-Search--searchFormClose').on('click.closeOverlay', function() {
                 $(this).parents('.widget-Search').removeClass('active');
             });
             
             var sync;
             var reloadSuggestion = function($widget) {
                 var qVal;
                 if($widget.val().length >= parseInt($widget.attr("data-minLength"))) {
                     qVal = $widget.val();
                 } else {
                 	qVal = null;
                 }
                 var jxhr = $widget.parents('.widget-Search--results').find('.widget-Suggestion').reloadWidget(undefined, true, {q: qVal});
                 $widget.data('jxhr', jxhr);
                 if(jxhr) jxhr.done(function(){
                 	$widget.data('jxhr', false);
                 });
             };
 
             $(document).off('keyup.widget-Search--searchfield', '.widget-Search--searchfield');
             $(document).on('keyup.widget-Search--searchfield', '.widget-Search--searchfield', function() {
            		var $this = $(this);
                 var oldJxhr = $this.data('jxhr');
                 if(oldJxhr) {
                 	oldJxhr.abort();
                 	$this.data('jxhr', false);
                 }
 				clearTimeout(sync);
 		 		sync = setTimeout(function(){
                     reloadSuggestion($this);
 		 		}, 300);
             });
 	   });
   </script>
   <script>
    (function() {
 			$(".widget-MobileNavToggleIcon--container").off("click.widget-MobileNavToggleIcon");
 			$(".widget-MobileNavToggleIcon--container").on("click.widget-MobileNavToggleIcon", function(e) {
 				e.stopPropagation();
 				var $this = $(this);
 				$('body').toggleClass('mobile-nav-open');
 				if($('body').is('.mobile-nav-open')) {
 					 $this.find(".widget-MobileNavToggleIcon--mobileNav").removeClass("fa-bars").addClass("fa-times");
 				} else $this.find(".widget-MobileNavToggleIcon--mobileNav").addClass("fa-bars").removeClass("fa-times");
 			});
 			$(document).off('click.widget-MobileNavToggleIconOffNavigation', '.mobile-nav-open:not(.widget-MobileNavToggleIcon)');
 			$(document).on('click.widget-MobileNavToggleIconOffNavigation', '.mobile-nav-open:not(.widget-MobileNavToggleIcon)', function(e) {
 				if(!e.target.closest('.navigation-top-mobile')) {
 					$('body').removeClass('mobile-nav-open');
 					$(".widget-MobileNavToggleIcon--mobileNav").addClass("fa-bars").removeClass("fa-times");
 				}
 			});
 		})();
   </script>
   <script>
    $(function() {
             var clicked = false;
             $(".widget-StoreIcon--myStoreIconLink").off("click.widget-StoreIcon");
             $(".widget-StoreIcon--myStoreIconLink").on("click.widget-StoreIcon", function(event) {
                 var $this = $(this).closest(".widget-StoreIcon--TopContainer");
                 clicked = true;
                 
                 setTimeout(function(){
                     var $container = $this.siblings(".widget-StoreIcon--container");
                     var $block = $this.closest('[data-widget-id]');
                     if($container.is(':visible')) {
                         $container.hide(50);
                         $block.trigger('removeReloadAction', [$(this).attr('data-widget-id')]);
                         
                     } else {
                         $container.show(50);
                         $block.trigger('addReloadAction', [$block.attr('data-widget-id'), function(){
                             $(this).children(".widget-StoreIcon--container").show();
                         }]);
                     }
                 });
             });
             $(document).off("click.widget-StoreIcon", '.widget-StoreIcon');
             $(document).on("click.widget-StoreIcon", '.widget-StoreIcon--container', function(event) {
                 event.stopImmediatePropagation();
             });
             
             $(document).on('click.widget-StoreIcon', function() {
                 if(!clicked) {
                     $(".widget-StoreIcon--container").hide(50);
                     
                     $('.widget-StoreIcon').each(function(){
                         $(this).trigger('removeReloadAction', [$(this).attr('data-widget-id')]);
                     });
                 }
                 clicked = false;
             });
             
             $(document).off("click.widget-StoreIcon---0f2243a4-5708-42d5-a8ba-4509618cb087", ".widget-StoreIcon--myStorePlaningRouteLink---0f2243a4-5708-42d5-a8ba-4509618cb087");
             $(document).on("click.widget-StoreIcon---0f2243a4-5708-42d5-a8ba-4509618cb087", ".widget-StoreIcon--myStorePlaningRouteLink---0f2243a4-5708-42d5-a8ba-4509618cb087", function(event) {
             	var that = this;
             	var $this = $(that);
             	if(typeof $this.attr('href') == 'undefined') {
             		event.preventDefault();
 	                var storePositionLAT = 52.44351;
 	                var storePositionLong = 9.70986;
 	                var errorCallback = function(err){
 	                	that.click();
 	                }
 	                $this.attr({
 	                    "href" : 'https://www.google.de/maps?daddr=' + storePositionLAT + ',' + storePositionLong + '&hl=de&ie=UTF8&mra=ls&t=m&z=12',
 	                    "target" : '_blank'
 	                });
 	                
 	                if(navigator && navigator.geolocation && typeof navigator.geolocation.getCurrentPosition == "function") {
 	                    navigator.geolocation.getCurrentPosition(function(pos){
 	                        var currentPositionLatitude = pos.coords.latitude;
 	                        var currentPositionLongitude = pos.coords.longitude;
 	                        $this.attr({
 	                            "href" : 'https://www.google.de/maps?saddr=' + currentPositionLatitude + ',' + currentPositionLongitude + '&daddr=' + storePositionLAT + ',' + storePositionLong + '&hl=de&ie=UTF8&mra=ls&t=m&z=12',
 	                            "target" : '_blank'
 	                        });
 	                        that.click();
 	                    }, errorCallback);
 	    			} else {
 	    				errorCallback();
 	            	}
             	}
             });
         });
   </script>
   <script>
    (function () {
 		var toggled = false;
 		$(document).off('click.widget-NavigationElement', '.widget-NavigationElement--arrow');
 		$(document).on('click.widget-NavigationElement', '.widget-NavigationElement--arrow', function(event) {
 			if(!toggled) {
 				if($(this).siblings('.widget-NavigationElement--sub-navigation').length) {
 					toggled = true;
 					$(this).parent('.widget-NavigationElement').toggleClass('active');
 					setTimeout(function(){
 						toggled = false;
 					});
 				} else {
 					window.location = $(this).siblings('a').attr('href');
 				}
 			}
 		});
 	})();
   </script>
   <script>
    $(document).off("prepareAdjustHeight.widget-Column", ".widget-Column");
 		$(document).on("prepareAdjustHeight.widget-Column", ".widget-Column", function(){
 			$(this).siblings( ".widget-Column" ).addClass("hidden");
 		});
 		$(document).off( "afterAdjustHeight.widget-Column", ".widget-Column");
 		$(document).on( "afterAdjustHeight.widget-Column", ".widget-Column", function(){
 			$(this).siblings( ".widget-Column" ).removeClass("hidden");
 		});
   </script>
   <script>
    $(function() {
             var clicked = false;
             $(".widget-StoreIcon--myStoreIconLink").off("click.widget-StoreIcon");
             $(".widget-StoreIcon--myStoreIconLink").on("click.widget-StoreIcon", function(event) {
                 var $this = $(this).closest(".widget-StoreIcon--TopContainer");
                 clicked = true;
                 
                 setTimeout(function(){
                     var $container = $this.siblings(".widget-StoreIcon--container");
                     var $block = $this.closest('[data-widget-id]');
                     if($container.is(':visible')) {
                         $container.hide(50);
                         $block.trigger('removeReloadAction', [$(this).attr('data-widget-id')]);
                         
                     } else {
                         $container.show(50);
                         $block.trigger('addReloadAction', [$block.attr('data-widget-id'), function(){
                             $(this).children(".widget-StoreIcon--container").show();
                         }]);
                     }
                 });
             });
             $(document).off("click.widget-StoreIcon", '.widget-StoreIcon');
             $(document).on("click.widget-StoreIcon", '.widget-StoreIcon--container', function(event) {
                 event.stopImmediatePropagation();
             });
             
             $(document).on('click.widget-StoreIcon', function() {
                 if(!clicked) {
                     $(".widget-StoreIcon--container").hide(50);
                     
                     $('.widget-StoreIcon').each(function(){
                         $(this).trigger('removeReloadAction', [$(this).attr('data-widget-id')]);
                     });
                 }
                 clicked = false;
             });
             
             $(document).off("click.widget-StoreIcon---554f175b-c771-4abf-9d09-acde280fa6c9", ".widget-StoreIcon--myStorePlaningRouteLink---554f175b-c771-4abf-9d09-acde280fa6c9");
             $(document).on("click.widget-StoreIcon---554f175b-c771-4abf-9d09-acde280fa6c9", ".widget-StoreIcon--myStorePlaningRouteLink---554f175b-c771-4abf-9d09-acde280fa6c9", function(event) {
             	var that = this;
             	var $this = $(that);
             	if(typeof $this.attr('href') == 'undefined') {
             		event.preventDefault();
 	                var storePositionLAT = 52.44351;
 	                var storePositionLong = 9.70986;
 	                var errorCallback = function(err){
 	                	that.click();
 	                }
 	                $this.attr({
 	                    "href" : 'https://www.google.de/maps?daddr=' + storePositionLAT + ',' + storePositionLong + '&hl=de&ie=UTF8&mra=ls&t=m&z=12',
 	                    "target" : '_blank'
 	                });
 	                
 	                if(navigator && navigator.geolocation && typeof navigator.geolocation.getCurrentPosition == "function") {
 	                    navigator.geolocation.getCurrentPosition(function(pos){
 	                        var currentPositionLatitude = pos.coords.latitude;
 	                        var currentPositionLongitude = pos.coords.longitude;
 	                        $this.attr({
 	                            "href" : 'https://www.google.de/maps?saddr=' + currentPositionLatitude + ',' + currentPositionLongitude + '&daddr=' + storePositionLAT + ',' + storePositionLong + '&hl=de&ie=UTF8&mra=ls&t=m&z=12',
 	                            "target" : '_blank'
 	                        });
 	                        that.click();
 	                    }, errorCallback);
 	    			} else {
 	    				errorCallback();
 	            	}
             	}
             });
         });
   </script>
   <script>
    $(".widget-Carousel--slick-slider").children('.slick-dots').children().addClass('openSubElement openSubElementByClick');
 		
 		$('.widget-Carousel').on('beforeChange', function(event, slick, currentSlide, nextSlide){
 			var $block = slick.$slider.closest('[data-widget-id]');
 			$block.trigger('addReloadAction', [$block.attr('data-widget-id'), function(){
 				$(this).children('.widget-Carousel--view-carousel').children('.widget-Carousel--slick-slider').slick('slickGoTo', nextSlide, true);
 			}]);
 		});
 		
 		$('.btWidgetAssign .widgetContainer').off('click.pageCarousel', '.widget-Carousel--arrow');
 		$('.btWidgetAssign .widgetContainer').on('click.pageCarousel', '.widget-Carousel--arrow', function(e){
 			e.stopPropagation();
 		});
 		
 		$('.btWidgetAssign .widgetContainer').off('click.pageCarousel', '.widget-Carousel--slick-slider > .slick-dots > i');
 		$('.btWidgetAssign .widgetContainer').on('click.pageCarousel', '.widget-Carousel--slick-slider > .slick-dots > i', function(e){
 			e.stopPropagation();
 		});
 		
 		$(".widget-Carousel").off("afterChange.widget-Carousel");
 		$(".widget-Carousel").on("afterChange.widget-Carousel", function(event, slick, currentSlide){
 			$(this).trigger("carouselPageChange", [currentSlide]);
 		});
 		
 		$('.widget-Carousel').off("timelinePageChange.widget-Carousel");
 		$('.widget-Carousel').on("timelinePageChange.widget-Carousel", function(event, index, slides){
 			$(this).children('.widget-Carousel--view-carousel').children(".widget-Carousel--slick-slider").slick('slickGoTo', index);
 		});
   </script>
   <script>
    $(".widget-ArticlePrice--priceInfo").each(function(){
                 $(this).tooltip({
                     position: {
                         my: "center bottom-20",
                         at: "center top",
                         using: function(position, feedback) {
                             $(this).css(position);
                             $("<div>").addClass("arrow").addClass(feedback.vertical).addClass(feedback.horizontal).appendTo(this);
                         }
                    	}
                	});
         	});
   </script>
   <script>
    (function(){
 			
 			var visibilityReceivers = [];
 			
 			function triggerVisibilityChange(){
 				for( var i = 0; i < visibilityReceivers.length; i++ ){
 					visibilityReceivers[i].trigger( "visibilityChanged" );
 				}
 			}
 
 			var getTabByHash = function(hash){
 				if(typeof hash == 'undefined') hash = window.location.hash;
 				hash = hash.split('?')[0];
 				if(hash.search('-tab+$') < 0) hash += '-tab';
 				return $('.widget-Tabs--headline[href="' + hash + '"]');
 			}
 			
 			var changeTab = function(event, ui){
 				var returnVal = true;
 				var $block = ui.newTab.closest('.widget-Tabs');
 				ui.oldPanel.find('[data-widget-id]').each(function(){
 					if($(this).triggerHandler('change.tab', [ui]) === false) returnVal = false;
 				});
 				$block.find('.widget-Tabs--li.visible-mobile').removeClass('visible-mobile');
 				setTimeout(function(){
 					$block.find('.widget-Tabs--li.visible-mobile').removeClass('visible-mobile');
 				});
 				if(returnVal) {
 					if(getTabByHash().length > 0 || !window.location.hash || window.location.hash == '#_') {
 						window.location.hash = ui.newPanel.attr('id').split('-tab')[0];
 					}
 					if((ui.newTab.is(getTabByHash().parent()) && !$block.is('.skipScrollOnce')) || $block.data('reload-tabs-on-change')) setTimeout(function(){
 						ui.newTab.scrollIntoView({
 							offset: {top:getScrollOffset()}
 						});
 					}); else $block.removeClass('skipScrollOnce');
 				} else {
 					event.stopImmediatePropagation();
 				}
 				return returnVal;
 			};
 	
 			$('a.widget-Tabs--headline').off('click.widget-Tabs--headline');
 			$('a.widget-Tabs--headline').on('click.widget-Tabs--headline', function(event){
 				var $this = $(this);
 				var href = $this.attr('href');
 				var $tab = getTabByHash(href);
 				var hash = window.location.hash.split('?')[0];
 				if($this.is('.skipHashChangeOnce')) $this.removeClass('.skipHashChangeOnce');
 				else if($tab.length > 0 && (!hash || hash == '#_' || getTabByHash(hash).length > 0) && hash + '-tab' != href) {
 					$this.closest('.widget-Tabs').addClass('skipScrollOnce');
 				}
 			});
 			
 			/* tabs init */
 			setTimeout(function(){
 				$('.widget-Tabs--tabs').each(function(){
 					var active = parseInt($(this).data('current-tab'));
 					if(isNaN(active)) {
 						try {
 							active = Math.max($(this).find(window.location.hash.split('?')[0] + '-tab').prevAll().length - 1, 0);
 						} catch(e) {
 							console.warn('hash couldn\'t be interpreted in widgets.tabs.init.active', e);
 						}
 					}
 					if(isNaN(active)) active = 0;
 	
 					if(active > 0) {
 						var $ul = $(this).children('.widget-Tabs--ul')
 						var $newTab = $ul.children('.widget-Tabs--li:eq(' + active + ')');
 						var $oldTab = $ul.children('.widget-Tabs--li:eq(0)');
 						
 						var ui = {
 							newTab: $newTab,
 							oldTab: $oldTab,
 							newPanel: $(this).children('.widget-Tabs--subContent' + $newTab.children('a.widget-Tabs--headline').attr('href')),
 							oldPanel: $(this).children('.widget-Tabs--subContent' + $oldTab.children('a.widget-Tabs--headline').attr('href'))
 						};
 						
 						if(!changeTab.apply(this, [undefined, ui])) active = 0;
 					}
 					
 					$(this).tabs({
 						activate: function(event, ui){
 							var $block = $(this).closest('[data-widget-id]');
 							var position = ui.newTab.prevAll('.ui-tab').length;
 							$block.trigger('addReloadAction', [$block.attr('data-widget-id'), function(){
 								$(this).children('.widget-Tabs--tabs').tabs({
 									active: position
 								});
 							}]);
 							ui.oldPanel.find('[data-widget-id]').each(function(){
 								$(this).triggerHandler('isHidden');
 							});
 							ui.newPanel.find('[data-widget-id]').each(function(){
 								$(this).triggerHandler('isVisible');
 							});
 							triggerVisibilityChange();
 						},
 						create: function(event, ui){
 							ui.panel.find('[data-widget-id]').each(function(){
 								$(this).triggerHandler('isVisible');
 							});
 						},
 						active: active
 					});
 				});
 				if(false) {
 					/* disable key functions in editor so tinyMCE works properly */
 					$('.widget-Tabs').children(".widget-Tabs--tabs").find(".widget-Tabs--li").off('keydown');
 				}
 			});
 			
 			if(!false) {
 				$(document).off('tabsbeforeactivate.widget-Tabs', '.widget-Tabs--tabs');
 				$(document).on('tabsbeforeactivate.widget-Tabs', '.widget-Tabs--tabs', changeTab);
 			}
 
 			$('.widget-Tabs--tabs').off( "visibilityReceiver" );
 			$('.widget-Tabs--tabs').on( "visibilityReceiver", function( ev, $element ){
 				visibilityReceivers.push( $element );
 				ev.stopPropagation();
 			});
 			
 			$(document).off( "show", ".widget-Tabs--tabs > .ui-widget-content" );
 			$(document).on( "show", ".widget-Tabs--tabs > .ui-widget-content", function( ev ){
 				$(this).closest('.widget-Tabs--tabs').tabs({
 				  active: $(this).prevAll('.ui-widget-content').length
 				});
 				ev.stopPropagation();
 			});
 			
 			$(document).off( "showUntil", ".widget-Tabs--tabs > .ui-widget-content" );
             $(document).on( "showUntil", ".widget-Tabs--tabs > .ui-widget-content", function( ev, executable ){
                 var $tabs = $(this).closest('.widget-Tabs--tabs');
                 if( $(this).prevAll('.ui-widget-content').length != $tabs.children('.widget-Tabs--ul').children('.widget-Tabs--li.ui-tabs-active').prevAll('.ui-tab').length ){
                  	var prevSelected = $tabs.children('.widget-Tabs--ul').children('.widget-Tabs--li.ui-tabs-active').prevAll('.ui-tab').length;
                     $tabs.tabs({
                         active: $(this).prevAll('.ui-widget-content').length
                     });
                     if(typeof executable == 'function') executable();
                     $tabs.tabs({
                         active: prevSelected
                     });
                 } else {
                     if(typeof executable == 'function') executable();
                 }
             });
 		})();
   </script>
   <script>
    $('.widget-ArticleImage--viewImage').off('click.widget-ArticleImage');
         $('.widget-ArticleImage--viewImage').on('click.widget-ArticleImage', function(){
         	$(this).siblings('.widget-ArticleImage--articleImageContainer').find('.widget-ArticleImage--articleImage').trigger('click');
         });
         
         $('.widget-ArticleImage').off('changeArticleImage.widget-ArticleImage');
         $('.widget-ArticleImage').on('changeArticleImage.widget-ArticleImage', function(event, newUrl, zoomUrl, position){
             $(this).children('.widget-ArticleImage--articleImageWrapper').children('.widget-ArticleImage--articleVideoContainer').find('video').each(function(){
                 this.pause();
             });
             $('.widget-ArticleImage--articleVideoContainer').hide();
             $('.widget-ArticleImage--articleImageContainer').show();
             event.stopPropagation();
             var $imageContainer = $(this).children('.widget-ArticleImage--articleImageWrapper').children('.widget-ArticleImage--articleImageContainer');
             $imageContainer.find('.widget-ArticleImage--blueimpLink').attr('href', zoomUrl);
             var ez = $imageContainer.find('.widget-ArticleImage--articleImage')
 	            .attr('src', newUrl)
 	            .attr('data-zoom-image', zoomUrl)
 	            .data('blue-imp-position', position)
 	            .data('elevateZoom');
             if(typeof ez != "undefined") { 
                 ez.swaptheimage(newUrl, zoomUrl);
             }
         });
         
         $('.widget-ArticleImage').off('changeArticleVideo.widget-ArticleImage');
         $('.widget-ArticleImage').on('changeArticleVideo.widget-ArticleImage', function(event, mp4, ogg, webM){
             $('.widget-ArticleImage--articleImageContainer').hide();
             $('.widget-ArticleImage--articleVideoContainer').show();
             var $video = $(this).children('.widget-ArticleImage--articleImageWrapper').children('.widget-ArticleImage--articleVideoContainer');
             $video.find('video').hide();
             var $oldVid = $video.find('[data-uniqueCheck="' + mp4 + ogg + webM + '"]');
             $video.find('video').each(function(){
                 if(!$(this).is($oldVid)) this.pause();
             });
             if($oldVid.length == 0) {
                 $video.append('\
                     <video class="articleVideo" data-uniqueCheck="' + mp4 + ogg + webM + '" controls>\
                         <source src="' + mp4 + '" type="video/mp4">\
                         <source src="' + ogg + '" type="video/ogg">\
                         <source src="' + webM + '" type="video/webm">\
                         Your browser does not support the video tag.\
                     </video>\
                 ');
             } else {
                 $oldVid.show();
             }
         });
   </script>
   <script>
    (function(){
         function isElementInViewBounds(el) {
         var rect     = el.getBoundingClientRect(),
             vWidth   = window.innerWidth;
             return ((rect.left + rect.width)  <= vWidth);
         }
         function openHoverOverlay(trigger){
             var overlay = $("#hover-overlay");
             if(overlay.length == 0){
                 var overlaytemplate = '<div id="hover-overlay" class="ct-overlay"><div class="hover-background"></div><div class="hover-content"><img class="hover-image img-responsive" src=""></img></div></div>';
                 $('.pageWrapper:first').append(overlaytemplate);
                 overlay = $("#hover-overlay");
             }
             overlay.width(trigger.width());
             var $hoverContent = overlay.find(".hover-content").empty();
             trigger.find(".widget-Hover--toggeling").children().each(function(){
                 $hoverContent.append($(this).clone(true, true));
             });
             var triggerpos = trigger.offset();
             overlay.offset({top: triggerpos.top, left: triggerpos.left});
             if(!isElementInViewBounds(overlay[0])){
                 overlay.offset({top: triggerpos.top, left: (triggerpos.left - (overlay.width() * 0.5))});
             }
             if($(trigger).hasClass("widget-Hover--triggerHoverOverlay---preset-cover")){
                 overlay.addClass("cover");
             }
             $('.ct-overlay').removeClass('active');
             overlay.addClass("active");
         }
         function closeHoverOverlay(){
             $('#hover-overlay').removeClass("active");
         }
         var passedHoverOverlay = false
         $(document).off('touchstart.widget-Hover', '.widget-Hover--triggerHoverOverlay');
         $(document).on('touchstart.widget-Hover', '.widget-Hover--triggerHoverOverlay', function(event){
         	passedHoverOverlay = true;
             openHoverOverlay($(this));
         });
         $(document).off('touchstart.widget-Hover-hover', '#hover-overlay');
         $(document).on('touchstart.widget-Hover-hover', '#hover-overlay', function(event){
         	passedHoverOverlay = true;
         });
         $(document).off('touchstart.widget-Hover-doc');
         $(document).on('touchstart.widget-Hover-doc', function(event){
            	if(!passedHoverOverlay) closeHoverOverlay();
            	passedHoverOverlay = false;
         });
         
         $(document).off('mouseenter.widget-Hover', '.widget-Hover--triggerHoverOverlay');
         $(document).on('mouseenter.widget-Hover', '.widget-Hover--triggerHoverOverlay', function(){
        		openHoverOverlay($(this));
         });
         $(document).off('mouseleave.widget-Hover', '#hover-overlay');
         $(document).on('mouseleave.widget-Hover', '#hover-overlay', function(){
             closeHoverOverlay();
         });
     })();
 
     $('.widget-Hover').off('openSubElement.widget-Hover');
     $('.widget-Hover').on('openSubElement.widget-Hover', function(){
         $(this).addClass('hover');
         $('.ui-draggable').draggable({refreshPositions: true});
     });
     $('.widget-Hover').off('endOpenSubElement.widget-Hover');
     $('.widget-Hover').on('endOpenSubElement.widget-Hover', function(){
         $(this).removeClass('hover');
         $('.ui-draggable').draggable({refreshPositions: true});
     });
   </script>
   <script>
    (function(){
 			$(document).off('keypress.widget-NewsletterRegistrationTeaser--newsletterRegistrationMail---view-newsletter-registration-teaser-guest', '.widget-NewsletterRegistrationTeaser--newsletterRegistrationMail---view-newsletter-registration-teaser-guest');
 			$(document).on('keypress.widget-NewsletterRegistrationTeaser--newsletterRegistrationMail---view-newsletter-registration-teaser-guest', '.widget-NewsletterRegistrationTeaser--newsletterRegistrationMail---view-newsletter-registration-teaser-guest', function(event) {
 				if(event.which == 13) {
 					$(this).siblings('.widget-NewsletterRegistrationTeaser--popup').click();
 				}
 			});
 			
 			$(document).off('click.widget-NewsletterRegistrationTeaser--button---view-newsletter-registration-teaser-guest', '.widget-NewsletterRegistrationTeaser--button---view-newsletter-registration-teaser-guest');
 			$(document).on('click.widget-NewsletterRegistrationTeaser--button---view-newsletter-registration-teaser-guest', '.widget-NewsletterRegistrationTeaser--button---view-newsletter-registration-teaser-guest', function(event) {
 				$(this).closest('.widget-NewsletterRegistrationTeaser').find('.widget-NewsletterRegistrationTeaser--popup').click();
 			});
 			
 			$(document).off('click.widget-NewsletterRegistrationTeaser--popup---view-newsletter-registration-teaser-guest', '.widget-NewsletterRegistrationTeaser--popup---view-newsletter-registration-teaser-guest');
 			$(document).on('click.widget-NewsletterRegistrationTeaser--popup---view-newsletter-registration-teaser-guest', '.widget-NewsletterRegistrationTeaser--popup---view-newsletter-registration-teaser-guest', function(event) {
 				var emailAddress = $(this).closest('.widget-NewsletterRegistrationTeaser').find('.widget-NewsletterRegistrationTeaser--newsletterRegistrationMail').val();
 				var successPopup = $(this).attr('href');
 				if(successPopup != '') {
 					if(successPopup.indexOf('emailAddress') === -1) {
 						var startSeperator = '&';
 						if(successPopup.indexOf("?") === -1) {
 							startSeperator = '?';
 						}	
 					}
 					successPopup = successPopup + startSeperator + 'emailAddress=' + encodeURIComponent(emailAddress);				
 					window.location = successPopup;
 				}
 				return false;
 			});
 		})();
   </script>
   <script>
    (function(){
 			$(document).off('keypress.widget-NewsletterRegistrationTeaser--newsletterRegistrationMail---view-newsletter-registration-guest', '.widget-NewsletterRegistrationTeaser--newsletterRegistrationMail---view-newsletter-registration-guest');
 			$(document).on('keypress.widget-NewsletterRegistrationTeaser--newsletterRegistrationMail---view-newsletter-registration-guest', '.widget-NewsletterRegistrationTeaser--newsletterRegistrationMail---view-newsletter-registration-guest', function(event) {
 				if(event.which == 13) {
 					$(this).siblings('.widget-NewsletterRegistrationTeaser--popup').click();
 				}
 			});
 			
 			$(document).off('click.widget-NewsletterRegistrationTeaser--button---view-newsletter-registration-guest', '.widget-NewsletterRegistrationTeaser--button---view-newsletter-registration-guest');
 			$(document).on('click.widget-NewsletterRegistrationTeaser--button---view-newsletter-registration-guest', '.widget-NewsletterRegistrationTeaser--button---view-newsletter-registration-guest', function(event) {
 				$(this).closest('.widget-NewsletterRegistrationTeaser').find('.widget-NewsletterRegistrationTeaser--popup').click();
 			});
 			
 			$(document).off('click.widget-NewsletterRegistrationTeaser--popup---view-newsletter-registration-guest', '.widget-NewsletterRegistrationTeaser--popup---view-newsletter-registration-guest');
 			$(document).on('click.widget-NewsletterRegistrationTeaser--popup---view-newsletter-registration-guest', '.widget-NewsletterRegistrationTeaser--popup---view-newsletter-registration-guest', function(event) {
 				var emailAddress = $(this).closest('.widget-NewsletterRegistrationTeaser').find('.widget-NewsletterRegistrationTeaser--newsletterRegistrationMail').val();
 				var successPopup = $(this).attr('href');
 				if(successPopup != '') {
 					if(successPopup.indexOf('emailAddress') === -1) {
 						var startSeperator = '&';
 						if(successPopup.indexOf("?") === -1) {
 							startSeperator = '?';
 						}	
 					}
 					successPopup = successPopup + startSeperator + 'emailAddress=' + encodeURIComponent(emailAddress);				
 					window.location = successPopup;	
 				}
 				return false;
 			});
 		})();
   </script>
   <script>
    $(function	() {
 			if(!window.ButtonToTopWidgetScrollEventIsBound) {
 				window.ButtonToTopWidgetScrollEventIsBound = true;
 				$(window).scroll(function (){
 					if($(window).scrollTop() > 250){
 						$('.widget-ButtonToTop').fadeIn();
 					}
 					else {
 						$('.widget-ButtonToTop').fadeOut();
 					}
 				});
 				
 				$(document).off('click.widget-ButtonToTop', '.widget-ButtonToTop')
 				$(document).on('click.widget-ButtonToTop', '.widget-ButtonToTop', function(){
 					$('body, html').animate({
 						scrollTop : 0
 					}, 800);
 					return false;
 				});
 			}
 		});
   </script>
   <script>
    if(typeof popupAutostart == 'undefined') popupAutostart = {};
 		if(typeof popupAutostart['83a15968-ddbf-479e-99c9-e74678a44b09'] == 'undefined') {
 			popupAutostart['83a15968-ddbf-479e-99c9-e74678a44b09'] = true;
 			(function(){
 				if(!false) {					
 					//autoStart function
 					var isMobile = checkMobile();
 					var autoStart;
 					if(
 						(
 							(
 								-1 > -1
 								&& !isMobile
 							)
 							||
 							(
 								0 > -1
 								&& isMobile
 							)
 						)
 					) {
 						autoStart = setTimeout(function(){
 							$('.widget-Popup').hide();
 							$('html').removeClass('popupOpen');
 							if($(document).triggerHandler('autostart.popup', ['83a15968-ddbf-479e-99c9-e74678a44b09']) !== false) window.location.hash = '#83a15968-ddbf-479e-99c9-e74678a44b09'
 							if("fmarktcookie" != "") {
 								Cookies.set('fmarktcookie_opened', 'true');
 							}
 						}, -1 * 1000);
 					}
 			
 					//autoStart-Stop function
 					$(document).off('preventAutostat.popupWidget', '.widget-Popup---83a15968-ddbf-479e-99c9-e74678a44b09');
 					$(document).on('preventAutostat.popupWidget', '.widget-Popup---83a15968-ddbf-479e-99c9-e74678a44b09', function(e){
 						clearTimeout(autoStart);
 					});
 				}
 			})();
 		}
   </script>
   <script>
    if(typeof popupAutostart == 'undefined') popupAutostart = {};
 		if(typeof popupAutostart['4ba6c06a-c423-463d-9bcc-50f274c94df3'] == 'undefined') {
 			popupAutostart['4ba6c06a-c423-463d-9bcc-50f274c94df3'] = true;
 			(function(){
 				if(!false) {					
 					//autoStart function
 					var isMobile = checkMobile();
 					var autoStart;
 					if(
 						(
 							(
 								-1 > -1
 								&& !isMobile
 							)
 							||
 							(
 								0 > -1
 								&& isMobile
 							)
 						)
 					) {
 						autoStart = setTimeout(function(){
 							$('.widget-Popup').hide();
 							$('html').removeClass('popupOpen');
 							if($(document).triggerHandler('autostart.popup', ['4ba6c06a-c423-463d-9bcc-50f274c94df3']) !== false) window.location.hash = '#4ba6c06a-c423-463d-9bcc-50f274c94df3'
 							if("fmarktcookie" != "") {
 								Cookies.set('fmarktcookie_opened', 'true');
 							}
 						}, -1 * 1000);
 					}
 			
 					//autoStart-Stop function
 					$(document).off('preventAutostat.popupWidget', '.widget-Popup---4ba6c06a-c423-463d-9bcc-50f274c94df3');
 					$(document).on('preventAutostat.popupWidget', '.widget-Popup---4ba6c06a-c423-463d-9bcc-50f274c94df3', function(e){
 						clearTimeout(autoStart);
 					});
 				}
 			})();
 		}
   </script>
   <script>
    if(typeof popupAutostart == 'undefined') popupAutostart = {};
 		if(typeof popupAutostart['50d36c33-efe0-44e4-9ba0-23517d37fec9'] == 'undefined') {
 			popupAutostart['50d36c33-efe0-44e4-9ba0-23517d37fec9'] = true;
 			(function(){
 				if(!false) {					
 					//autoStart function
 					var isMobile = checkMobile();
 					var autoStart;
 					if(
 						(
 							(
 								0 > -1
 								&& !isMobile
 							)
 							||
 							(
 								-1 > -1
 								&& isMobile
 							)
 						)
 					) {
 						autoStart = setTimeout(function(){
 							$('.widget-Popup').hide();
 							$('html').removeClass('popupOpen');
 							if($(document).triggerHandler('autostart.popup', ['50d36c33-efe0-44e4-9ba0-23517d37fec9']) !== false) window.location.hash = '#50d36c33-efe0-44e4-9ba0-23517d37fec9'
 							if("fmarktcookie" != "") {
 								Cookies.set('fmarktcookie_opened', 'true');
 							}
 						}, 0 * 1000);
 					}
 			
 					//autoStart-Stop function
 					$(document).off('preventAutostat.popupWidget', '.widget-Popup---50d36c33-efe0-44e4-9ba0-23517d37fec9');
 					$(document).on('preventAutostat.popupWidget', '.widget-Popup---50d36c33-efe0-44e4-9ba0-23517d37fec9', function(e){
 						clearTimeout(autoStart);
 					});
 				}
 			})();
 		}
   </script>
   <script>
    (function(){
 			var slidesToShow = (1 < 1 ? 1:1);
 			var slidesToScroll = (1 < 1 ? 1:1);
 			var autoPlaySpeed = (6000 < 1000 ? 1000:6000);
 			var responsive = [];
 			if(breakpoints instanceof Array && breakpoints.length > 1) {
 				for(var i = 0; i < breakpoints.length; i++) {
 					var entry = {};
 					entry.breakpoint = breakpoints[i];
 					entry.settings = {};
 					entry.settings.slidesToShow = Math.max(1, Math.floor(slidesToShow * ((breakpoints.length - i) / breakpoints.length)));
 					entry.settings.slidesToScroll = Math.max(1, Math.floor(slidesToScroll * ((breakpoints.length - i) / breakpoints.length)));
 					responsive.push(entry);
 				}
 			}
 			
 			var slickConfig = {
 				dots: true,
 				infinite: true,
 				speed: 300,
 				respondTo: 'min',
 				adaptiveHeight: false,
 				autoplay: true,
 				autoplaySpeed: autoPlaySpeed,
 				slidesToShow: slidesToShow,
 				slidesToScroll: slidesToScroll,
 				arrows: true,
 				prevArrow: '<div class="widget-Carousel--arrow widget-Carousel--arrow---left">\
 					<i class="fa fa-angle-left openSubElement openSubElementMultiple openSubElementByClick widget-Carousel--arrow-icon widget-Carousel--arrow-icon---left"></i>\
 				</div>',
 				nextArrow: '<div class="widget-Carousel--arrow widget-Carousel--arrow---right">\
 					<i class="fa fa-angle-right openSubElement openSubElementMultiple openSubElementByClick widget-Carousel--arrow-icon widget-Carousel--arrow-icon---right"></i>\
 				</div>',
 				responsive: responsive
 			};
 
 			if(false) {
 				slickConfig.accessibility = false;
 				slickConfig.draggable = false;
 				slickConfig.touchMove = false;
 			}
 			$(".widget-Carousel--slick-slider---93888057-714d-41a6-8258-a3f0c45963f2").slick(slickConfig);
 			
 			$('.widget-Carousel---93888057-714d-41a6-8258-a3f0c45963f2').off('isVisible.widget-Carousel---93888057-714d-41a6-8258-a3f0c45963f2');
 			$('.widget-Carousel---93888057-714d-41a6-8258-a3f0c45963f2').on('isVisible.widget-Carousel---93888057-714d-41a6-8258-a3f0c45963f2', function(){
 				var $this = $(this);
 				$this.find(".widget-Carousel--slick-slider---93888057-714d-41a6-8258-a3f0c45963f2").slick('unslick');
 				$this.find(".widget-Carousel--slick-slider---93888057-714d-41a6-8258-a3f0c45963f2").slick(slickConfig);
 			});
 		})();
   </script>
   <script>
    (function(){
 			var bp = {"XS":480,"SM":768,"MD":992,"LG":1200,"MAIL":596};
 			var mobileBreakpoint = 1200;
 			if(typeof bp['MD'] != 'undefined') {
 				mobileBreakpoint = bp['LG'];
 			}
 			function isItMobile(){
 				return $(window).width() <= mobileBreakpoint
 			}
 			function slickify(selector){
 				if(false && $(window).width() > mobileBreakpoint) {
 				    $(selector).slick({
 						infinite: false,
 				    	dots: false,
 						speed: 300,
 						slidesToShow: 1,
 						variableWidth: true,
 						prevArrow: '<li class="tabs-icon-right"><i class="fa fa-chevron-left" aria-hidden="true"></i></li>',
 						nextArrow: '<li class="tabs-icon-left"><i class="fa fa-chevron-right" aria-hidden="true"></i></li>',
 						arrows: true,
 						accessibility: false,
 						responsive: [
 						    {
 						        breakpoint: mobileBreakpoint,
 						        settings: "unslick"
 						    }
 						]
 				    });
 				}
 			}
 			/* deactivate tabs */
 			setTimeout(function(){
 				if(false) {
 					var disable = [];
 					for(var i = 1; i < 3; i++) {
 						disable.push(i);
 					}
 					$('.widget-Tabs--tabs---f042830e-5992-4211-aff0-4c2966534f33').tabs( "option", "disabled", disable);
 				}
 			});
 			/* slide init */
 			slickify('.widget-Tabs--ul---f042830e-5992-4211-aff0-4c2966534f33');   
 
 			$(document).off('click.widget-Tabs', '.widget-Tabs--li---f042830e-5992-4211-aff0-4c2966534f33');					
 			$(document).on('click.widget-Tabs', '.widget-Tabs--li---f042830e-5992-4211-aff0-4c2966534f33', function(){					
 				if(isItMobile()){
 					var $block = $(this).closest('.widget-Tabs--tabs')
 					if($(this).hasClass('visible-mobile') == false){
 						$block.find('.widget-Tabs--li').addClass('visible-mobile');							
 					}else{
 						$block.find('.widget-Tabs--li').removeClass('visible-mobile');							
 					}
 				}				
 			});
 			$(window).resize(function(){
 				var $slick = $('.widget-Tabs--ul---f042830e-5992-4211-aff0-4c2966534f33');
 				if(isItMobile() && $slick.is('.slick-slider')) $slick.slick('unslick');
 				else if(!$slick.is('.slick-slider') || $slick.slick('getSlick').unslicked) slickify($slick);
 			});
 
 			var showTabCorrelation = {};
 			var hideTabCorrelation = {};
 			var corrolationKeyList = {};
 			for(var key in showTabCorrelation) {
 				corrolationKeyList[key] = true;
 			}
 			for(var key in hideTabCorrelation) {
 				corrolationKeyList[key] = true;
 			}
 			
 			for(var key in corrolationKeyList) {
 				(function(key){
 					$(document).off('tabCorrolation.widget-Tabs--subContent---f042830e-5992-4211-aff0-4c2966534f33#tabs-' + key + '-tab', '.widget-Tabs--subContent---f042830e-5992-4211-aff0-4c2966534f33#tabs-' + key + '-tab');
 					$(document).on('tabCorrolation.widget-Tabs--subContent---f042830e-5992-4211-aff0-4c2966534f33#tabs-' + key + '-tab', '.widget-Tabs--subContent---f042830e-5992-4211-aff0-4c2966534f33#tabs-' + key + '-tab', function(){
 						if(!false) {
 							if(typeof showTabCorrelation[key] != 'undefined') for(var entry in showTabCorrelation[key]) {
 								$('.widget-Tabs--headline---f042830e-5992-4211-aff0-4c2966534f33[href="#tabs-' + entry + '-tab"]').parent().removeClass('hidden');
 							}
 							if(typeof hideTabCorrelation[key] != 'undefined') for(var entry in hideTabCorrelation[key]) {
 								$('.widget-Tabs--headline---f042830e-5992-4211-aff0-4c2966534f33[href="#tabs-' + entry + '-tab"]').parent().addClass('hidden');
 							}
 							if(!$('.widget-Tabs--li---f042830e-5992-4211-aff0-4c2966534f33.ui-tabs-active').is(':visible')) {
 								$('.widget-Tabs--li---f042830e-5992-4211-aff0-4c2966534f33:not(.hidden):visible:first > a').addClass('skipHashChangeOnce').trigger('click');
 							}
 						}
 					});
 				})(key);
 			}
 			
 			if(false) {
 				var getCurrentTabIdByParameter = function(all){
 					if(typeof all == 'undefined') all = getAllURLParameter('tab-entry');
 					var current = false;
 					for(var i = all.length - 1; i >= 0; i--) {
 						if(all[i].indexOf('f042830e-5992-4211-aff0-4c2966534f33:') == 0) {
 							current = all[i].split(':')[1];
 							break;
 						}
 					}
 					return current;
 				}
 				
 				$(document).off('tabsbeforeactivate.widget-Tabs---f042830e-5992-4211-aff0-4c2966534f33', '.widget-Tabs---f042830e-5992-4211-aff0-4c2966534f33');
 				$(document).on('tabsbeforeactivate.widget-Tabs---f042830e-5992-4211-aff0-4c2966534f33', '.widget-Tabs---f042830e-5992-4211-aff0-4c2966534f33', function(event, ui){
 					var all = getAllURLParameter('tab-entry');
 					var oldId = getCurrentTabIdByParameter(all);
 					var newId = ui.newPanel.attr('id').slice(5).split('-tab')[0];
 					for(var i = all.length - 1; i >= 0; i--) {
 						if(all[i].indexOf('f042830e-5992-4211-aff0-4c2966534f33:') == 0) all.splice(i, 1);
 					}
 					all.push('f042830e-5992-4211-aff0-4c2966534f33:' + newId);
 					removeParam('tab-entry', true);
 					for(var i = 0; i < all.length; i++) {
 						insertURLParam('tab-entry', all[i], !i, true);
 						if(typeof history.replaceState == "function") window.history.replaceState(null, null, '#tabs-' + all[i].split(':')[1]);
 						else window.location.hash = '#tabs-' + all[i].split(':')[1];
 					}
 					$(this).reloadWidget();
 					return false;
 				});
 				
 				$(window).off('popstate.widget-Tabs');
 				$(window).on('popstate.widget-Tabs', function(){
 					var current = getCurrentTabIdByParameter();
 					var reload = false;
 					
 					if(current) {
 						$('.widget-Tabs--tabs---f042830e-5992-4211-aff0-4c2966534f33').each(function(){
 							if($(this).find('.widget-Tabs--subContent---f042830e-5992-4211-aff0-4c2966534f33:eq("' + $(this).tabs('option', 'active') + '")').data('tab-id') != current) {
 								reload = true;
 								return false;
 							}
 						});
 						
 					} else {
 						$('.widget-Tabs--tabs---f042830e-5992-4211-aff0-4c2966534f33').each(function(){
 							if($(this).tabs('option', 'active') > 0) {
 								reload = true;
 								return false;
 							}
 						});
 					}
 					
 					if(reload) $('.widget-Tabs---f042830e-5992-4211-aff0-4c2966534f33').reloadWidget();
 				});
 			}
 		})();
   </script>
   <script>
    (function(){
 			var bp = {"XS":480,"SM":768,"MD":992,"LG":1200,"MAIL":596};
 			var mobileBreakpoint = 1200;
 			if(typeof bp['MD'] != 'undefined') {
 				mobileBreakpoint = bp['LG'];
 			}
 			function isItMobile(){
 				return $(window).width() <= mobileBreakpoint
 			}
 			function slickify(selector){
 				if(false && $(window).width() > mobileBreakpoint) {
 				    $(selector).slick({
 						infinite: false,
 				    	dots: false,
 						speed: 300,
 						slidesToShow: 1,
 						variableWidth: true,
 						prevArrow: '<li class="tabs-icon-right"><i class="fa fa-chevron-left" aria-hidden="true"></i></li>',
 						nextArrow: '<li class="tabs-icon-left"><i class="fa fa-chevron-right" aria-hidden="true"></i></li>',
 						arrows: true,
 						accessibility: false,
 						responsive: [
 						    {
 						        breakpoint: mobileBreakpoint,
 						        settings: "unslick"
 						    }
 						]
 				    });
 				}
 			}
 			/* deactivate tabs */
 			setTimeout(function(){
 				if(false) {
 					var disable = [];
 					for(var i = 1; i < 5; i++) {
 						disable.push(i);
 					}
 					$('.widget-Tabs--tabs---4339febb-8fe8-4c45-9b67-8ca12f40af24').tabs( "option", "disabled", disable);
 				}
 			});
 			/* slide init */
 			slickify('.widget-Tabs--ul---4339febb-8fe8-4c45-9b67-8ca12f40af24');   
 
 			$(document).off('click.widget-Tabs', '.widget-Tabs--li---4339febb-8fe8-4c45-9b67-8ca12f40af24');					
 			$(document).on('click.widget-Tabs', '.widget-Tabs--li---4339febb-8fe8-4c45-9b67-8ca12f40af24', function(){					
 				if(isItMobile()){
 					var $block = $(this).closest('.widget-Tabs--tabs')
 					if($(this).hasClass('visible-mobile') == false){
 						$block.find('.widget-Tabs--li').addClass('visible-mobile');							
 					}else{
 						$block.find('.widget-Tabs--li').removeClass('visible-mobile');							
 					}
 				}				
 			});
 			$(window).resize(function(){
 				var $slick = $('.widget-Tabs--ul---4339febb-8fe8-4c45-9b67-8ca12f40af24');
 				if(isItMobile() && $slick.is('.slick-slider')) $slick.slick('unslick');
 				else if(!$slick.is('.slick-slider') || $slick.slick('getSlick').unslicked) slickify($slick);
 			});
 
 			var showTabCorrelation = {};
 			var hideTabCorrelation = {};
 			var corrolationKeyList = {};
 			for(var key in showTabCorrelation) {
 				corrolationKeyList[key] = true;
 			}
 			for(var key in hideTabCorrelation) {
 				corrolationKeyList[key] = true;
 			}
 			
 			for(var key in corrolationKeyList) {
 				(function(key){
 					$(document).off('tabCorrolation.widget-Tabs--subContent---4339febb-8fe8-4c45-9b67-8ca12f40af24#tabs-' + key + '-tab', '.widget-Tabs--subContent---4339febb-8fe8-4c45-9b67-8ca12f40af24#tabs-' + key + '-tab');
 					$(document).on('tabCorrolation.widget-Tabs--subContent---4339febb-8fe8-4c45-9b67-8ca12f40af24#tabs-' + key + '-tab', '.widget-Tabs--subContent---4339febb-8fe8-4c45-9b67-8ca12f40af24#tabs-' + key + '-tab', function(){
 						if(!false) {
 							if(typeof showTabCorrelation[key] != 'undefined') for(var entry in showTabCorrelation[key]) {
 								$('.widget-Tabs--headline---4339febb-8fe8-4c45-9b67-8ca12f40af24[href="#tabs-' + entry + '-tab"]').parent().removeClass('hidden');
 							}
 							if(typeof hideTabCorrelation[key] != 'undefined') for(var entry in hideTabCorrelation[key]) {
 								$('.widget-Tabs--headline---4339febb-8fe8-4c45-9b67-8ca12f40af24[href="#tabs-' + entry + '-tab"]').parent().addClass('hidden');
 							}
 							if(!$('.widget-Tabs--li---4339febb-8fe8-4c45-9b67-8ca12f40af24.ui-tabs-active').is(':visible')) {
 								$('.widget-Tabs--li---4339febb-8fe8-4c45-9b67-8ca12f40af24:not(.hidden):visible:first > a').addClass('skipHashChangeOnce').trigger('click');
 							}
 						}
 					});
 				})(key);
 			}
 			
 			if(false) {
 				var getCurrentTabIdByParameter = function(all){
 					if(typeof all == 'undefined') all = getAllURLParameter('tab-entry');
 					var current = false;
 					for(var i = all.length - 1; i >= 0; i--) {
 						if(all[i].indexOf('4339febb-8fe8-4c45-9b67-8ca12f40af24:') == 0) {
 							current = all[i].split(':')[1];
 							break;
 						}
 					}
 					return current;
 				}
 				
 				$(document).off('tabsbeforeactivate.widget-Tabs---4339febb-8fe8-4c45-9b67-8ca12f40af24', '.widget-Tabs---4339febb-8fe8-4c45-9b67-8ca12f40af24');
 				$(document).on('tabsbeforeactivate.widget-Tabs---4339febb-8fe8-4c45-9b67-8ca12f40af24', '.widget-Tabs---4339febb-8fe8-4c45-9b67-8ca12f40af24', function(event, ui){
 					var all = getAllURLParameter('tab-entry');
 					var oldId = getCurrentTabIdByParameter(all);
 					var newId = ui.newPanel.attr('id').slice(5).split('-tab')[0];
 					for(var i = all.length - 1; i >= 0; i--) {
 						if(all[i].indexOf('4339febb-8fe8-4c45-9b67-8ca12f40af24:') == 0) all.splice(i, 1);
 					}
 					all.push('4339febb-8fe8-4c45-9b67-8ca12f40af24:' + newId);
 					removeParam('tab-entry', true);
 					for(var i = 0; i < all.length; i++) {
 						insertURLParam('tab-entry', all[i], !i, true);
 						if(typeof history.replaceState == "function") window.history.replaceState(null, null, '#tabs-' + all[i].split(':')[1]);
 						else window.location.hash = '#tabs-' + all[i].split(':')[1];
 					}
 					$(this).reloadWidget();
 					return false;
 				});
 				
 				$(window).off('popstate.widget-Tabs');
 				$(window).on('popstate.widget-Tabs', function(){
 					var current = getCurrentTabIdByParameter();
 					var reload = false;
 					
 					if(current) {
 						$('.widget-Tabs--tabs---4339febb-8fe8-4c45-9b67-8ca12f40af24').each(function(){
 							if($(this).find('.widget-Tabs--subContent---4339febb-8fe8-4c45-9b67-8ca12f40af24:eq("' + $(this).tabs('option', 'active') + '")').data('tab-id') != current) {
 								reload = true;
 								return false;
 							}
 						});
 						
 					} else {
 						$('.widget-Tabs--tabs---4339febb-8fe8-4c45-9b67-8ca12f40af24').each(function(){
 							if($(this).tabs('option', 'active') > 0) {
 								reload = true;
 								return false;
 							}
 						});
 					}
 					
 					if(reload) $('.widget-Tabs---4339febb-8fe8-4c45-9b67-8ca12f40af24').reloadWidget();
 				});
 			}
 		})();
   </script>
   <script>
    (function() {
             var $frame = $('.widget-ArticlePPM--ppm-frame---9f5a4e7e-83fc-4870-bbac-b89ae7617b5d');
             var $slidee = $frame.children('div').eq(0);
             var $wrap = $frame.parent();
             // Call Sly on frame
             var $sly = $frame.sly({
                 horizontal: true,
                 itemNav: 'basic',
                 smart: true,
                 activateOn: 'click',
                 mouseDragging: true,
                 touchDragging: true,
                 releaseSwing: true,
                 startAt: false,
                 scrollBar: $wrap.find('.scrollbar'),
                 scrollBy: true,
                 activatePageOn: 'click',
                 speed: 300,
                 elasticBounds: true,
                 easing: 'easeOutExpo',
                 dragHandle: true,
                 dynamicHandle: true,
                 clickBar: true
             },{
                 move: [function(){
                 	$('#hover-overlay').removeClass('active');
                 }]
             });
             $(window).resize(function(e) {
                 $sly.sly('reload');
             }); 			
         }());
   </script>
   <script>
    (function() {
             var $frame = $('.widget-ArticlePPM--ppm-frame---b5f9008d-ebf7-4900-9617-c07ee1151e0b');

             var $wrap = $frame.parent();

   <script>
    (function() {

   <script>
    (function() {
             var $frame = $('.widget-ArticlePPM--ppm-frame---2c7adee6-817d-4323-990c-66ba55927a14');
             var $slidee = $frame.children('div').eq(0);
             var $wrap = $frame.parent();
             // Call Sly on frame
             var $sly = $frame.sly({
                 horizontal: true,
                 itemNav: 'basic',
                 smart: true,
                 activateOn: 'click',
                 mouseDragging: true,
                 touchDragging: true,
                 releaseSwing: true,
                 startAt: false,
                 scrollBar: $wrap.find('.scrollbar'),
                 scrollBy: true,
                 activatePageOn: 'click',
                 speed: 300,
                 elasticBounds: true,
                 easing: 'easeOutExpo',
                 dragHandle: true,
                 dynamicHandle: true,
                 clickBar: true
             },{
                 move: [function(){
                 	$('#hover-overlay').removeClass('active');
                 }]
             });
             $(window).resize(function(e) {
                 $sly.sly('reload');
             }); 			
         }());
   </script>
   <script>
    (function() {
             var $frame = $('.widget-ArticlePPM--ppm-frame---280d7211-b60d-471a-9c75-4fa1eb984a43');
             var $slidee = $frame.children('div').eq(0);
             var $wrap = $frame.parent();
             // Call Sly on frame
             var $sly = $frame.sly({
                 horizontal: true,
                 itemNav: 'basic',
                 smart: true,
                 activateOn: 'click',
                 mouseDragging: true,
                 touchDragging: true,
                 releaseSwing: true,
                 startAt: false,
                 scrollBar: $wrap.find('.scrollbar'),
                 scrollBy: true,
                 activatePageOn: 'click',
                 speed: 300,
                 elasticBounds: true,
                 easing: 'easeOutExpo',
                 dragHandle: true,
                 dynamicHandle: true,
                 clickBar: true
             },{
                 move: [function(){
                 	$('#hover-overlay').removeClass('active');
                 }]
             });
             $(window).resize(function(e) {
                 $sly.sly('reload');
             }); 			
         }());
   </script>

                 clickBar: true
             },{

   <script>
    (function(){
 			var slidesToShow = (3 < 1 ? 1:3);
 			var slidesToScroll = (3 < 1 ? 1:3);
 			var autoPlaySpeed = (3000 < 1000 ? 1000:3000);
 			var responsive = [];
 			if(breakpoints instanceof Array && breakpoints.length > 1) {
 				for(var i = 0; i < breakpoints.length; i++) {
 					var entry = {};
 					entry.breakpoint = breakpoints[i];
 					entry.settings = {};
 					entry.settings.slidesToShow = Math.max(1, Math.floor(slidesToShow * ((breakpoints.length - i) / breakpoints.length)));
 					entry.settings.slidesToScroll = Math.max(1, Math.floor(slidesToScroll * ((breakpoints.length - i) / breakpoints.length)));
 					responsive.push(entry);
 				}
 			}
 			
 			var slickConfig = {
 				dots: true,
 				infinite: true,
 				speed: 300,
 				respondTo: 'min',
 				adaptiveHeight: false,
 				autoplay: false,
 				autoplaySpeed: autoPlaySpeed,
 				slidesToShow: slidesToShow,
 				slidesToScroll: slidesToScroll,
 				arrows: false,
 				prevArrow: '<div class="widget-Carousel--arrow widget-Carousel--arrow---left">\
 					<i class="fa fa-angle-left openSubElement openSubElementMultiple openSubElementByClick widget-Carousel--arrow-icon widget-Carousel--arrow-icon---left"></i>\
 				</div>',
 				nextArrow: '<div class="widget-Carousel--arrow widget-Carousel--arrow---right">\
 					<i class="fa fa-angle-right openSubElement openSubElementMultiple openSubElementByClick widget-Carousel--arrow-icon widget-Carousel--arrow-icon---right"></i>\
 				</div>',
 				responsive: responsive
 			};
 
 			if(false) {
 				slickConfig.accessibility = false;
 				slickConfig.draggable = false;
 				slickConfig.touchMove = false;
 			}
 			$(".widget-Carousel--slick-slider---20aa9baf-2085-4854-b043-65b20331d0f1").slick(slickConfig);
 			
 			$('.widget-Carousel---20aa9baf-2085-4854-b043-65b20331d0f1').off('isVisible.widget-Carousel---20aa9baf-2085-4854-b043-65b20331d0f1');
 			$('.widget-Carousel---20aa9baf-2085-4854-b043-65b20331d0f1').on('isVisible.widget-Carousel---20aa9baf-2085-4854-b043-65b20331d0f1', function(){
 				var $this = $(this);
 				$this.find(".widget-Carousel--slick-slider---20aa9baf-2085-4854-b043-65b20331d0f1").slick('unslick');
 				$this.find(".widget-Carousel--slick-slider---20aa9baf-2085-4854-b043-65b20331d0f1").slick(slickConfig);
 			});
 		})();
   </script>
