    window.emos3.send({'siteid':'0','countryid':'2879130','content':'Elektromarkt in Ihrer Nähe mit Online-Shop \u2013 expert'});
   </script>
   <script>
    $(function() {
  			var clicked = false;
  			$(".widget-ShoppingCartIcon--shopCartHeadmoduleButton").off("click.widget-ShoppingCartIcon--shopCartHeadmoduleButton");
  			$(".widget-ShoppingCartIcon--shopCartHeadmoduleButton").on("click.widget-ShoppingCartIcon--shopCartHeadmoduleButton", function(event) { 
 				var $this = $(this);
 				clicked = true;
 				
 				setTimeout(function(){
 					var $container = $this.siblings(".widget-ShoppingCartIcon--shopCartHeadmoduleFlyout");
 					var $block = $this.closest('[data-widget-id]');
 					if($container.is(':visible')) {
 						$container.hide(50);
 						$block.trigger('removeReloadAction', [$(this).attr('data-widget-id')]);
 						
 					} else {
 						$container.show(50);
 						$block.trigger('addReloadAction', [$block.attr('data-widget-id'), function(){
 							$(this).children(".widget-ShoppingCartIcon--shopCartHeadmoduleFlyout").show();
 						}]);
 					}
 				});
  			});
  			
  			$(document).off("click.widget-ShoppingCartIcon");
  			$(document).on("click.widget-ShoppingCartIcon", '.widget-ShoppingCartIcon--shopCartHeadmoduleFlyout', function(event) {
  				event.stopImmediatePropagation();
  			});
  			
  			$(document).on('click.widget-ShoppingCartIcon', function() {
 				if(!clicked) {
 					$(".widget-ShoppingCartIcon--shopCartHeadmoduleFlyout").hide(50);
 					
 					$('.widget-ShoppingCartIcon').each(function(){
 						$(this).trigger('removeReloadAction', [$(this).attr('data-widget-id')]);
 					});
 				}
 				clicked = false;
  			});
  			
  			$(document).off("reload.widget.checkout.articleList.widget-ShoppingCartIcon");
  			$(document).on("reload.widget.checkout.articleList.widget-ShoppingCartIcon", function(e) {
  	    		if(!e.widgetList) e.widgetList = $();
  	    		e.widgetList = e.widgetList.add($('.widget-ShoppingCartIcon'));
  			});
  		});
   </script>
   <script>
    (function(){
 		var block = 'widget-Image--blueimp-namespace';
 		var selector = '.widget-Image--blueimpLink .widget-Image--img';
 		$(document).ready(function(){
 			$('.widget-Image--blueimpLink').addClass(block);
 		});
 		if($('#' + block + '-blueimp-gallery').length == 0) {
 			$('body').append('<div id="' + block + '-blueimp-gallery" class="blueimp-gallery blueimp-gallery-controls">\
 			    <div class="slides"></div>\
 			    <h3 class="title"></h3>\
 			    <div class="overlay"></div>\
 			    <a class="prev"><i class="fa fa-caret-left"></i></a>\
 			    <a class="next"><i class="fa fa-caret-right"></i></a>\
 			    <a class="close"><i class="fa fa-close"></i></a>\
 			    <a class="play-pause"></a>\
 			    <ol class="indicator"></ol>\
 			</div><div class="window-overlay"></div>');
 			
 			$(document).off('click.window-overlay', '.window-overlay');
 			$(document).on('click.window-overlay','.window-overlay', function(){
 				$(".blueimp-gallery .close .fa-close").click();
 			});
 		}
 		$(document).off('click.imageWidget', selector);
 		$(document).on('click.imageWidget', selector, function(e){
 			var $this = $(this);
 			var $link = $this.closest('a');
 			var position = parseInt($this.data('blue-imp-position'));
 			if(isNaN(position)) {
 				$('.' + block).each(function(index){
 					if($link.attr('href') == $(this).attr('href')) {
 						position = $(this).prevALL('.' + block).length;
 						return false;
 					}
 				});
 			}
 			if(isNaN(position)) position = $this.prevALL('.' + block).length - 1;
 			e.preventDefault();
 			if(true) blueimp.Gallery(document.getElementsByClassName(block), {
 				index: position,
 				event: e,
 				container: '#' + block + '-blueimp-gallery',
 				carousel: true,
 				toggleControlsOnSlideClick: false,
 				toggleControlsOnReturn: false,
 				enableKeyboardNavigation: true,
 				titleProperty: "title",
 				closeOnEscape: true
 			});
 			return false;
 		});
 	})();
   </script>
   <script>
    $(function() {
 			var clicked = false;
 			$(".widget-MyAccountIcon--TopContainer").off("click.widget-MyAccountIcon");
 			$(".widget-MyAccountIcon--TopContainer").on("click.widget-MyAccountIcon", function(event) {
 				var $this = $(this);
 				clicked = true;
 				
 				setTimeout(function(){
 					var $container = $this.siblings(".widget-MyAccountIcon--container");
 					var $block = $this.closest('[data-widget-id]');
 					if($container.is(':visible')) {
 						$container.hide(50);
 						$block.trigger('removeReloadAction', [$(this).attr('data-widget-id')]);
 						
 					} else {
 						$container.show(50);
 						$block.trigger('addReloadAction', [$block.attr('data-widget-id'), function(){
 							$(this).children(".widget-MyAccountIcon--container").show();
 						}]);
 					}
 					
 				});
 			});
 
 			$(document).off("click.widget-MyAccountIcon");
 			$(document).on("click.widget-MyAccountIcon", '.widget-MyAccountIcon--container', function(event) {
 				event.stopImmediatePropagation();
 			});
 			
 			$(document).on('click.widget-MyAccountIcon', function() {
 				if(!clicked) {
 					$(".widget-MyAccountIcon--container").hide(50);
 					
 					$('.widget-MyAccountIcon').each(function(){
 						$(this).trigger('removeReloadAction', [$(this).attr('data-widget-id')]);
 					});
 				}
 				clicked = false;
 			});
 
 	    	$(document).off('reload.widget.customer.login.widget-MyAccountIcon');
 	    	$(document).on('reload.widget.customer.login.widget-MyAccountIcon', function(e){
 	    		if(!e.widgetList) e.widgetList = $();
 	    		e.widgetList = e.widgetList.add($('.widget-MyAccountIcon'));
 	    	});
     	});
   </script>
   <script>
    (function(){
             function countLines(object) {
                 var divHeight = object.offsetHeight
                 var lineHeight = $(object).css('line-height');
                 var lines = divHeight / parseInt(lineHeight, 10);
                 return lines;
             }
             $(document).ready(function(){
                 $('.widget-ArticleName').each(function(){
                     var maxRows = $(this).attr("data-maximum-row");
                     var source = $(this).find(".content");
                     var cutContent = false;
                     while(countLines(this) > maxRows) {
                         source.text(source.text().slice(0, -2));
                         cutContent = true;
                     }
                     if(cutContent == true){
 	                    source.text(source.text().slice(0, -3));
 	                    source.text(source.text() + "...");
                     }
                 });
             });
         })();
   </script>
   <script>
    $(document).off('click.widget-Button--button---closemodal', '.widget-Button--button');
 		$(document).on('click.widget-Button--button---closemodal', '.widget-Button--button', function(e){
 			if ($(this).data('closemodal') === true){
 				$(this).trigger('disableModal');
 			}
 		});
   </script>
   <script>
    (function(){
 			/* hide empty tabs */
 			if(!false) {
 				setTimeout(function(){
 					$('.widget-Tabs--subContent.hideEmpty').each(function(){
 						var result = [];
 						$(this).find('[data-widget-id]').each(function(){
 							result.push($(this).triggerHandler('checkIsEmpty'));
 						});
 						var show = false;
 						for(var i = 0; i < result.length; i++) {
 							if(!result[i]) show = true;
 						}
 						
 						if(!show) {
 							var $li = $('.widget-Tabs--headline[href="#' + $(this).attr('id') + '"]').parent().addClass('hidden');
 							if($li.prevAll('.widget-Tabs--li:visible').length == 0) {
 								$li.nextAll(':not(.hidden):visible:first').children('a').addClass('skipHashChangeOnce').trigger('click');
 							}
 						}
 					});
 				});
 			}
 			
 			var getTabByHash = function(hash){
 				if(typeof hash == 'undefined') hash = window.location.hash;
 				hash = hash.split('?')[0];
 				if(hash.search('-tab+$') < 0) hash += '-tab';
 				return $('.widget-Tabs--headline[href="' + hash + '"]');
 			}
 			
 			var isTabDisabled = function($tab){
 				var disabled = $tab.closest('.widget-Tabs--tabs').tabs( "option", "disabled" );
 				if(disabled && disabled instanceof Array && disabled.indexOf($tab.closest('.widget-Tabs--li').prevAll('.widget-Tabs--li').length) >= 0) {
 					return true;
 				} else return false;
 			}
 			
 			$(document).off('click.widget-Tabs', 'a:not(.widget-Tabs--headline)');
 			$(document).on('click.widget-Tabs', 'a:not(.widget-Tabs--headline)', function(e){
 				var $tab = getTabByHash($(this).attr('href'));
 				var hash = window.location.hash.split('?')[0];
 				var $oldTab = getTabByHash(hash);
 				if($tab.length > 0 && hash && hash != '#_' && ($oldTab.length == 0 || $oldTab.closest('.widget-Tabs').data('reload-tabs-on-change'))) {
 					if(!isTabDisabled($tab)) $tab.trigger('click');
 					e.preventDefault();
 					return false;
 				}
 			});
 			
 			var hashChange = function(){
 				var $tab = getTabByHash();
 				if($tab.length > 0) {
 					if(isTabDisabled($tab)) {
 						window.history.pushState(null, null, window.location.href.split('#')[0]);
 					} else {
 						var $block = $tab.closest('.widget-Tabs');
 						$block.find('.widget-Tabs--li').addClass('visible-mobile');
 						$tab.trigger('click');
 					}
 				}
 			};
 			
 			/* change tab on hash change */
 			$(document).off('click.widget-Tabs', 'a');
 			$(document).on('click.widget-Tabs', 'a', function(){
 				var prevHash = window.location.hash;
 				var $this = $(this);
 				if($(this).attr('href') == prevHash) {
 					setTimeout(function(){
 						if(prevHash == window.location.hash) {
 							$(window).trigger('hashchange.widget-Tabs');
 						}
 					});
 				}
 			});
 			
 			/* change tab on hash change */
 			$(window).off('hashchange.widget-Tabs');
 			$(window).on('hashchange.widget-Tabs', hashChange);
 			
 			var getIndexById = function($block, index){
 				if(typeof index == 'string') {
 					var $element = $block.find('a.widget-Tabs--headline[href="' + index + '"]');
 					if($element.length > 0) index = $element.parent().prevAll().length;
 				}
 				return index;
 			}
 			
 			/* enable tab by trigger with index */
 			$(document).off('allowTabChange.widget-Tabs', '.widget-Tabs');
 			$(document).on('allowTabChange.widget-Tabs', '.widget-Tabs', function(event, index){
 				index = getIndexById($(this), index);
 				if(typeof index == 'string') {
 					index = getIndexById($(this), index + '-tab');
 				}
 				if(typeof index == 'number') {
 					var disabled = $(this).children('.widget-Tabs--tabs').tabs( "option", "disabled" );
 					if(disabled && disabled.indexOf(index) >= 0) {
 						disabled.splice(disabled.indexOf(index), 1)
 						$(this).children('.widget-Tabs--tabs').tabs( "option", "disabled", disabled);
 					}
 				} else $(this).children('.widget-Tabs--tabs').tabs( "option", "disabled", false);
 			});
 			
 			/* disable tab by trigger with index */
 			$(document).off('disallowTabChange.widget-Tabs', '.widget-Tabs');
 			$(document).on('disallowTabChange.widget-Tabs', '.widget-Tabs', function(event, index){
 				index = getIndexById($(this), index);
 				if(typeof index == 'string') {
 					index = getIndexById($(this), index + '-tab');
 				}
 				if(typeof index == 'number') {
 					var disabled = $(this).children('.widget-Tabs--tabs').tabs( "option", "disabled" );
 					if(disabled && disabled.indexOf(index) < 0) {
 						disabled.push(index);
 						$(this).children('.widget-Tabs--tabs').tabs( "option", "disabled", disabled);
 					} else $(this).children('.widget-Tabs--tabs').tabs( "option", "disabled", [index]);
 				}
 			});
 			
 			/* enable next tab by trigger */
 			$(document).off('allowChangeToNextTab.widget-Tabs', '.widget-Tabs--subContent');
 			$(document).on('allowChangeToNextTab.widget-Tabs', '.widget-Tabs--subContent', function(event, index){
 				$(this).trigger('allowTabChange', [$(this).prevAll('.widget-Tabs--subContent').length + 1])
 			});
 			
 			/* disable next tab by trigger */
 			$(document).off('disallowChangeToNextTab.widget-Tabs', '.widget-Tabs--subContent');
 			$(document).on('disallowChangeToNextTab.widget-Tabs', '.widget-Tabs--subContent', function(event, index){
 				$(this).trigger('disallowTabChange', [$(this).prevAll('.widget-Tabs--subContent').length + 1])
 			});
 			
 			$(document).off('hideTab.widget-Tabs', '.widget-Tabs--subContent');
 			$(document).on('hideTab.widget-Tabs', '.widget-Tabs--subContent', function(event, index){
 				$('.widget-Tabs--headline[href="#' + $(this).attr('id') + '"]').closest('.widget-Tabs--li').hide();
 				if($(this).is(':visible')) {
 					var $block = $(this).closest('.widget-Tabs');
 					$block.find('.widget-Tabs--li:not(.hidden):visible:first > a').addClass('skipHashChangeOnce').trigger('click');
 					if($block.find('.widget-Tabs--headline:not(.hidden):visible:first').length == 0) $block.hide();
 					else $block.show();
 				}
 			});
 			
 			$(document).off('showTab.widget-Tabs', '.widget-Tabs--subContent');
 			$(document).on('showTab.widget-Tabs', '.widget-Tabs--subContent', function(event, index){
 				$('.widget-Tabs--headline[href="#' + $(this).attr('id') + '"]').closest('.widget-Tabs--li').show();
 			});
 			
 			$(document).off("tabsactivate.widget-Tabs--tabs", '.widget-Tabs--tabs');
 			$(document).on("tabsactivate.widget-Tabs--tabs", '.widget-Tabs--tabs', function(event, ui){
 				ui.newPanel.find('[data-widget-id]').each(function(){
 					$(this).triggerHandler('activated.tab', [ui]);
 				});
 			});
 		})();
   </script>
   <script>
    (function(){
         function isElementInViewBounds(el) {
         var rect     = el.getBoundingClientRect(),
             vWidth   = window.innerWidth;
             if ((rect.left + rect.width)  > vWidth){
                 return false;
             }else {
                 return true;
             }
         }
         function openEfficiencyRatingImageOverlay(trigger){
         	var overlay = $("#efficiencyrating-image-overlay");
             if(overlay.length == 0){
                 var overlaytemplate = '<div id="efficiencyrating-image-overlay" class="ct-overlay"><div class="efficiencyrating-background"></div><div class="efficiencyrating-content"><a class="efficiencyrating-link" href=""><img class="efficiencyrating-image img-responsive" src=""></img></a></div></div>';
                 $('.pageWrapper:first').append(overlaytemplate);
                 var overlay = $("#efficiencyrating-image-overlay");
             }
             var image = $(trigger).find(".widget-ArticleEfficiencyRating--efficiencyRating").attr('img-src');
             var triggerpos = $(trigger).offset();
             overlay.find(".efficiencyrating-image").attr('src',image);
             overlay.find(".efficiencyrating-link").attr('href',image);
             overlay.offset({top: triggerpos.top, left: triggerpos.left});
             if(isElementInViewBounds(overlay[0]) == false){
                 overlay.offset({top: triggerpos.top, left: (triggerpos.left - (overlay.width() * 0.5))});
             }
             $('.ct-overlay').removeClass('active');
             overlay.addClass("active");
         }
         function closeEfficiencyRatingImageOverlay(){
             $('#efficiencyrating-image-overlay').removeClass("active");
         }
         $(document).off('touchstart.widget-ArticleEfficiencyRating', '.widget-ArticleEfficiencyRating--triggerEfficiencyRatingImageOverlay');
         $(document).on('touchstart.widget-ArticleEfficiencyRating', '.widget-ArticleEfficiencyRating--triggerEfficiencyRatingImageOverlay', function(){
             openEfficiencyRatingImageOverlay(this);
         });
         $(document).off('touchstart.widget-ArticleEfficiencyRating', '#efficiencyrating-image-overlay');
         $(document).on('touchstart.widget-ArticleEfficiencyRating', '#efficiencyrating-image-overlay', function(){
             closeEfficiencyRatingImageOverlay();
         });
         
         $(document).off('mouseenter.widget-ArticleEfficiencyRating', '.widget-ArticleEfficiencyRating--triggerEfficiencyRatingImageOverlay');
         $(document).on('mouseenter.widget-ArticleEfficiencyRating', '.widget-ArticleEfficiencyRating--triggerEfficiencyRatingImageOverlay', function(){
             openEfficiencyRatingImageOverlay(this);
         });
         $(document).off('mouseleave.widget-ArticleEfficiencyRating', '#efficiencyrating-image-overlay');
         $(document).on('mouseleave.widget-ArticleEfficiencyRating', '#efficiencyrating-image-overlay', function(){
             closeEfficiencyRatingImageOverlay();
         });
     })();
   </script>
  </body>
 </html>
